front.title: Simple Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP) Extensions for Reflecting STAMP Packet Extension Headers

abstract.t: Simple Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP) and its optional extensions can be used for Edge-To-Edge (E2E) active measurement. In Situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) data fields can be used for recording and collecting Hop-By-Hop (HBH) and E2E operational and telemetry information. This document extends STAMP to reflect IPv6 extension headers and MPLS Network Action Sub-Stacks, for example, for hop-by-hop and edge-to-edge active measurements, including using IOAM data fields.
